T02D2526:168b-1: shr'i m'a nu dar r'a ma mandala no pi ka /
T02D2526:168b-3: dpal ldan rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2526:168b-4: gyi chog / dpal rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal
T02D2526:168b-5: lo // gru bzhi rdo rje 'chang chen sa //
T02D2526:168b-6: gsang sngags lnga yis bsdus pa yis //
T02D2526:168b-7: rdo rje theg pa thob byed pas //
T02D2526:168b-8: theg pa de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2526:168b-9: brgya rtsa bcu yi rnam pa yis //
T02D2526:168b-10: ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs bskor zhing //
T02D2526:168b-11: de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje che //
T02D2526:168b-12: rin chen padma sogs kyis brgyan //
T02D2526:168b-13: sa mchog bcu gsum pa nyid du //
T02D2526:168b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa //
T02D2526:168b-15: gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D2526:168b-16: de la bdag ni spyi bos 'dud //
T02D2526:168b-17: bde gshegs kun la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2526:168b-18: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma yi //
T02D2526:168b-19: dngos grub kun byed rab bsngags pa //
T02D2526:168b-21: de la dang po rdo rje 'chang chen po slob
T02D2526:168b-22: dpon sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs 'dzin par gyur pas
T02D2526:168b-23: bsam gtan dang rjes su mthun par ri phug gam
T02D2526:168b-24: chu bo'am rdzing bu la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas
T02D2526:169a-1: dang ldan pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02D2526:169a-2: kun du bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i tshul gyis bgegs thams cad gzhom par bya ba dang /
T02D2526:169a-3: phyogs thams cad bcings nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i nam mkha' bcing bar byas la /
T02D2526:169a-4: phyogs bcu na mthar thug pa med pa'i de bzhin
T02D2526:169a-5: gshegs pa rnams la dmigs la mchod pa nyi shu
T02D2526:169a-6: bya zhing sngom pa gzung ba byas la /
T02D2526:169a-7: rdo rje lta bu'i sgrub thabs kyi chogs bdag nyid bsgrub par byas la /
T02D2526:169a-8: rang gi snying gar rdo rje padma bsams la /
T02D2526:169a-9: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nam mkha'
T02D2526:169a-10: dang mnyam par sbyor bas rdo rje la bzhugs te
T02D2526:169a-11: gcig tu gyur pa rang rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2526:169a-12: badzra dh'a tu ra ham sa ham zhes brjod pa
T02D2526:169a-13: ji srid mngon du mthong bar gyur pa de srid
T02D2526:169a-15: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2526:169a-16: grub par gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams kyis
T02D2526:169a-17: bya ste / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mushti ham /
T02D2526:169a-22: bsgom par mi nus pa ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2526:169a-23: la sogs pa tshig tsam gyis dmigs pa la lta
T02D2526:169a-24: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po re re zhing
T02D2526:169a-25: 'bum bzlas te / de lta bus kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2526:169a-26: de nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pas
T02D2526:169a-27: ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gzungs kyi dkyil
T02D2526:169a-29: de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2526:169a-30: snying po dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang
T02D2526:169a-31: rig par bshad pa dkyil 'khor dang bcas par gzugs
T02D2526:169a-32: brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya de'i nang na
T02D2526:169a-34: so so'i rig sngags 'bum ma ma khri bzla ba'am /
T02D2526:169a-35: ji srid gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor grub pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D2526:169a-36: / de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2526:169a-37: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te //
T02D2526:169a-38: gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshib //
T02D2526:169a-39: mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo bsgrengs //
T02D2526:169a-40: dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go //
T02D2526:169a-41: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas /
T02D2526:169b-0: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub @169b par bya ste /
T02D2526:169b-1: rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2526:169b-2: shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2526:169b-3: dkyil 'khor rdo rje phra mo dang //
T02D2526:169b-4: ting de 'dzin ni dbang bsgyur ba'o //
T02D2526:169b-5: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2526:169b-6: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D2526:169b-7: de yis rdo rje brtan par bzung //
T02D2526:169b-8: mthe bong mthe'u chung bcings pa ni //
T02D2526:169b-9: rdo rje las mchog dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2526:169b-10: de ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02D2526:169b-11: de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am khru lnga bcu pa bya'o //
T02D2526:169b-12: blon po'am blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu pa'am nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
T02D2526:169b-13: chod dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'am de'i phyed do //
T02D2526:169b-14: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis pa'am khru drug pa'o //
T02D2526:169b-15: de las chung bar ni mi bya'o //
T02D2526:169b-16: de nas sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2526:169b-17: gtsug lag khang dang grong rdal dang //
T02D2526:169b-18: kun dga' grong ngam grong khyer ni //
T02D2526:169b-19: gang zhig shar dang byang du lta //
T02D2526:169b-20: lho dang nub tu ma yin no ;
T02D2526:169b-21: / shis shing sngon ni yongs brten pa'i //
T02D2526:169b-22: sa ni mkhas pas bgrod par bya //
T02D2526:169b-23: yang na yid ni dga' gyur pa //
T02D2526:169b-24: gang yin der ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2526:169b-25: der sa gzhi'i dbus su yi ge ham gis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2526:169b-26: de nas sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2526:169b-27: rdo dang bong ba shing rul pa la sogs pa bsal bar byas nas /
T02D2526:169b-28: chu'i dri zhim pos yongs su dgang ngo //
T02D2526:169b-29: de nas legs par bcags te shar dang byang du gzhol ba /
T02D2526:169b-30: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa /
T02D2526:169b-31: phyogs bzhi nas rta babs kyi phyi rol du shing
T02D2526:169b-32: gi dral sgos bskor cing shing dral sgo pa zhis
T02D2526:169b-33: nye bar mdzes par byas pas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi
T02D2526:169b-34: lhag par mdzes par byas pa gyur te /
T02D2526:169b-35: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2526:169b-36: der sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi gnas pas 'dug la /
T02D2526:169b-37: bsam gtan bzhi'i rim bzhin dmigs nas 'og min gyi gnas su 'dug ste /
T02D2526:169b-38: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
T02D2526:169b-39: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
T02D2526:169b-40: sems so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis
T02D2526:169b-41: rnam par sangs rgyas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab
T02D2526:169b-42: kyi steng du rdo rje rtse mo khang pa brtsegs
T02D2526:169b-43: pa nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de
T02D2526:170a-2: 'di ni dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2526:170a-3: de nas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms
T02D2526:170a-4: la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed de
T02D2526:170a-5: rdo rje bsdu ba byas nas rang gi snying gar
T02D2526:170a-6: gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa
T02D2526:170a-7: brgyad kyis bstod par bsgom pa ni /
T02D2526:170a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2526:170a-9: de nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng nas
T02D2526:170a-10: babs te dkyil 'khor sa gzhi'i dbus su las rgyal
T02D2526:170a-11: mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2526:170a-12: bskyed pa'i rim pas 'dug nas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2526:170a-13: la sogs pa'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms
T02D2526:170a-14: la / de'i sngags dang phyag rgya lan cig byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
T02D2526:170a-15: de nyid kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor de'i steng du nam mkha' la bsgom mo //
T02D2526:170a-16: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2526:170a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas //
T02D2526:170a-18: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02D2526:170a-20: sems dpa' chen po bcu drug gi //
T02D2526:170a-21: sngags kyis btab pa'i thig skud ni //
T02D2526:170a-22: sar pa las ni bkal nas ni //
T02D2526:170a-23: tshad dang mthun par mdzes pa yis //
T02D2526:170a-24: thig gi mkhas pas ci nus kyis //
T02D2526:170a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab bo //
T02D2526:170a-26: de nas thig gi phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2526:170a-27: rdo rje phyag rgyas thig bzung nas //
T02D2526:170a-28: dang por dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo //
T02D2526:170a-29: byi nas thig bzung bya ba ni //
T02D2526:170a-30: ji lta bas ni thig gdab bo //
T02D2526:170a-32: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2526:170a-33: de nas shar du mngon par phyogs la thig brkyang
T02D2526:170a-34: la slob ma nub tu lta bas thig bri ba
T02D2526:170a-35: dang / slob dpon lho phyogs su mngon par phyogs nas brkyang la /
T02D2526:170a-36: slob ma byang phyogs su mngon par phyogs la bre bar bya'o //
T02D2526:170a-38: phyogs kun mnyam par byas nas ni //
T02D2526:170a-39: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste //
T02D2526:170a-40: shar dang nub dang byang dang lho //
T02D2526:170a-41: phyogs bzhi'i thig gi dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02D2526:170a-43: de bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor la ni cha brgyad du brtag go //
T02D2526:170b-0: kun nas zur bzhi legs @170b par byas //
T02D2526:170b-1: phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor nas ni //
T02D2526:170b-2: sngags shes pas ni gnas bya ba //
T02D2526:170b-3: dbus kyi gnas ni spangs nas su //
T02D2526:170b-4: me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni //
T02D2526:170b-5: sngags pas sngags phyogs shes pa yis //
T02D2526:170b-6: snga ma bzhin du srad bu bre //
T02D2526:170b-7: de nas cho ga shes pa yis //
T02D2526:170b-8: dbang ldan phyogs su legs par bya //
T02D2526:170b-9: der ni nub tu mngon phyogs nas //
T02D2526:170b-10: byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya //
T02D2526:170b-11: de nas de ni dbang ldan mchog / yang ni rlung gi phyogs su gnas //
T02D2526:170b-12: lho yo phyogs su mngon phyogs pas //
T02D2526:170b-13: nub kyi phyogs su bre bar bya //
T02D2526:170b-14: gnas de yongs su spangs nas ni //
T02D2526:170b-15: bden bral gyi ni phyogs song ni //
T02D2526:170b-16: de nas ji srid nub phyogs kyi //
T02D2526:170b-17: spyod yul bar du bre bar bya //
T02D2526:170b-18: zhes 'khor lo mchog la sogs pas bsrung ba yin no //
T02D2526:170b-19: gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02D2526:170b-20: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
T02D2526:170b-23: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2526:170b-24: gru bzhi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02D2526:170b-25: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su //
T02D2526:170b-26: rdo rje rin chen sbras par ni //
T02D2526:170b-27: dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo //
T02D2526:170b-28: dkyil 'khor phyi rim gyi nang du //
T02D2526:170b-29: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02D2526:170b-30: ldan par 'khor lo bre bar bya'o //
T02D2526:170b-31: 'khor lo de'i nang du rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2526:170b-33: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ste //
T02D2526:170b-34: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha la //
T02D2526:170b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2526:170b-36: rten cing 'brel pa sngags pa yin //
T02D2526:170b-37: nor bu chen po'i rin po ches so sor spras
T02D2526:170b-38: pa'i dril bu kha dog sna tshogs pas btags pa'i
T02D2526:170b-39: rlung gis bskyod pa dar dang //
T02D2526:170b-41: me tog dang phreng ba dang dra ba dang /
T02D2526:170b-43: zla bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i khyams kyis bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du bres pa la ;
T02D2526:170b-44: de'i rim pa'i nang du zhugs la 'khor lo 'dra ba'i thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2526:170b-45: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas pa //
T02D2526:170b-46: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02D2526:170b-47: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la //
T02D2526:170b-48: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2526:171a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs kun gyi //
T02D2526:171a-3: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su //
T02D2526:171a-4: rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog / bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya //
T02D2526:171a-5: dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu //
T02D2526:171a-6: rdo rje gom pas song nas su //
T02D2526:171a-7: mi g-yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2526:171a-8: rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcas par gzhag / rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2526:171a-9: rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag / tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2526:171a-10: rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par gzhag / gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2526:171a-11: rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag /'khor lo yi ni nang logs su //
T02D2526:171a-12: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag / dkyil 'khor phyi yi grva rnams su //
T02D2526:171a-13: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag / sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni //
T02D2526:171a-14: sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bya //
T02D2526:171a-15: dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni //
T02D2526:171a-16: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /'jug gam phyi rol 'byung ba na //
T02D2526:171a-17: ri mo'am rdo rje srad bu dag / yid kyis brdeg pa byas na ni //
T02D2526:171a-18: de ni dam tshig nyams mi 'gyur //
T02D2526:171a-19: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02D2526:171a-20: de la rgyal po'i ni rin po che lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor bri'o //
T02D2526:171a-21: blon po chen po dang mdun blon gyis ni rin po che'i phye ma dang bsres pa'am /
T02D2526:171a-23: ded dpon la sogs pa ni 'bras btags pa'i phye mas so //
T02D2526:171a-24: sgrub pa pos ni 'bras kyi phye ma nyid bsngags pa yin no //
T02D2526:171a-25: gur gum la sogs pa'i phye ma dri zhim po'i khu bas sam tshon lngas btso'o //
T02D2526:171a-26: de nas dang por ni sngon po dgye'o //
T02D2526:171a-27: de nas ni gser dang padma r'a ga dang ma rgad dang mu tig dgye ste /
T02D2526:171a-29: sngon po thog mar gtang bar bya //
T02D2526:171a-30: de nas ser po gtang bar bya //
T02D2526:171a-31: de yi 'og tu dmar po ste //
T02D2526:171a-32: de yi 'og tu ljang gu gtang //
T02D2526:171a-33: kun gyi nang rol dkar po ste //
T02D2526:171a-34: tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad //
T02D2526:171a-36: yung ba dang rgya skyegs dang /
T02D2526:171a-38: tshon ni bzhi pos btso bar bya //
T02D2526:171a-39: lnga la dkar po'i rang bzhin ste /
T02D2526:171a-41: de la tshon bzlas pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2526:171b-0: rdo rje @171b khu tshur gnyis las ni //
T02D2526:171b-1: mdzub mo gnyis ni legs sbyar ba //
T02D2526:171b-2: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02D2526:171b-3: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2526:171b-4: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2526:171b-5: tshon la yang sems dpa' chen po bcu drug gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2526:171b-6: kun du bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi skabs su 'jug
T02D2526:171b-7: pa'i cho ga dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya nas
T02D2526:171b-8: brtsams te / sems dpa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i nang du bshad pas 'dir ma smras so //
T02D2526:171b-9: de yi sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2526:171b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas //
T02D2526:171b-11: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
T02D2526:171b-13: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D2526:171b-14: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2526:171b-15: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi //
T02D2526:171b-16: cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02D2526:171b-17: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pa nas //
T02D2526:171b-18: de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2526:171b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub pa //
T02D2526:171b-20: grub pa nyid du nye bar gnas //
T02D2526:171b-21: de nas phyag rgya dang sngags 'dis sgo dbye bar bya ste /
T02D2526:171b-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las ni //
T02D2526:171b-23: mdzub gnyis dam sbyar gan rkyal gzhag / shin tu khros pas rnam dbye ba //
T02D2526:171b-24: sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no //
T02D2526:171b-25: de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni //
T02D2526:171b-26: mnyam bzhag dbus su gnas gyur pa //
T02D2526:171b-27: yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid //
T02D2526:171b-28: rdo rje'i sgo ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D2526:171b-29: de la sgo dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2526:171b-30: aom badzra audgha ta ya sa ma ya bra be sha ya h'um /
T02D2526:171b-31: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02D2526:171b-32: lcags kyu la sogs pa bgyis nas //
T02D2526:171b-33: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis//
T02D2526:171b-34: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02D2526:171b-35: rdo rje lta bur bsgrub pa'i cho gas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa /
T02D2526:171b-36: phyag rgya chen po legs par bsgrub nas las kyi phyag rgya gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2526:171b-37: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgyas dang //
T02D2526:171b-38: sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa de ltar sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2526:171b-40: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
T02D2526:171b-41: sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu pa //
T02D2526:171b-42: spyan drangs nas ni rab tu gzhug / bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2526:171b-43: de nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2526:172a-0: gal te rgyal po nor che ba yin na @172a * //
T02D2526:172a-1: des rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba'i bum pa brgya'am /
T02D2526:172a-6: tha na rin po che las byas pa'i bum pa gcig byas la /
T02D2526:172a-7: lhag ma dag ni zangs dang sa dag las bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-8: blon po la sogs pa rnams kyis ni longs spyod dang rjes su 'tsham par bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-9: de la bum pa'i mtshan nyid ni mchu 'phyang ba
T02D2526:172a-10: mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che ba mgrin pa
T02D2526:172a-11: ras kyis dkris pa kha 'bras bus bkang ba /
T02D2526:172a-12: rin po che dang sman dang /
T02D2526:172a-14: spos chus yongs su gang ba byas nas gsang sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-15: de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2526:172a-17: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni rdo rje byin
T02D2526:172a-18: gyis brlab pa'i me tog gi yal gas bzlas brjod
T02D2526:172a-19: stong byas la / bdag po'i gnas su gzhag go //
T02D2526:172a-20: bum pa gzhan rnams ni bzlas brjod brgya byas la /
T02D2526:172a-21: sgo dang mtshams la sogs pa brgyad du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-22: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag ni 'bum tsam bya ste /
T02D2526:172a-23: stong las nyung bar mi bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-24: spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams la ni sngar rang gis mngon par gdab par bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-25: mar me'i sdod bu dang spos khang dang /
T02D2526:172a-26: mal stan la sogs pa ni 'bum las lhag par 'bul te /
T02D2526:172a-27: stong las nyung bar mi bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-28: blon po la sogs pas ni 'byor pa dang rjes su mthun par 'bul bar bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-29: rta dang glang po dang ba lang gi tshogs shin tu brtags ba rnams kyang 'bul bar bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-30: rta babs dril bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa ji snyed pa las kyang bya'o //
T02D2526:172a-31: de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T02D2526:172a-32: gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la //
T02D2526:172a-33: sems can don kun 'grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2526:172a-34: thams cad mdzod ces gsol ba gdab //
T02D2526:172a-35: gsol ba btab nas phyi rol du //
T02D2526:172a-36: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud kyi sngags kyis phyi rol tu gtor ma byin la /
T02D2526:172a-37: nye reg byas la nang du zhugs te cho ga
T02D2526:172a-38: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba rnams nye bar zhi
T02D2526:172a-39: bar bya ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas
T02D2526:172a-40: / phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang slob ma dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-1: gang gi tshe rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa na /
T02D2526:172b-2: slob mas kyang rdo rje khu tshur nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-3: gal te rgyal po ston pa na /
T02D2526:172b-4: rdo rje gnod sbyin nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-5: gang gis rdo rje chags pa ston pa na rdo rje bsrung ba nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-6: rdo rje gnod sbyin ston pa na rdo rje las nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-7: phyag rgya rang gi gnas su bkrol la thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-8: gang gi tshe rdo rje smra ba ston pa na rdo rje rin chen nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-9: gang gi tshe rdo rje 'khor lo ston pa na rdo rje gzi brjid nye bar bstan par bya'o ;
T02D2526:172b-10: / gang gi tshe rdo rje rnon po ston pa
T02D2526:172b-11: na rdo rje rgyal mtshan nye bar bstan par bya'o
T02D2526:172b-12: // gang gi tshe rdo rje chos ston pa na
T02D2526:172b-13: rdo rje bzhad pa nye bar bstan par bya ste
T02D2526:172b-14: // / phyag rgya bkrol zhing rang bzhin gyi gnas su thal mo nges par bcings te /
T02D2526:172b-15: de ltar byas pas ni dkyil 'khor du rdo rje
T02D2526:172b-16: 'dzin pa la sogs pa byin gyis rlob par mdzad
T02D2526:172b-17: par 'gyur ro // dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyi las yin no //
T02D2526:172b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi las ni zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyi ma'i zla ba nya'i bar ram /
T02D2526:172b-19: tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba nya'i bar ram
T02D2526:172b-20: bcu gnyis nas brtsams nas nya'i bar ram phyag rgya
T02D2526:172b-21: gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nyin mtshan gcig gis bya'o
T02D2526:172b-22: // de nas slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa
T02D2526:172b-23: yongs su bzung nas lhag par gnas par bya ste
T02D2526:172b-24: // gzhug par bya'o // phyag na rdo rjes byin brlabs shing //
T02D2526:172b-25: de bzhin dad pas bsgrub pa dang //
T02D2526:172b-26: byang chub sems dang 'gro don gyis //
T02D2526:172b-27: byang chub sems dpar 'gyur bas na //
T02D2526:172b-28: dag pa'i chos kyi rjes 'jug pa //
T02D2526:172b-29: theg pa che la lhag mos pas //
T02D2526:172b-31: zhes bya bas rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid dang
T02D2526:172b-32: ldan pas slob ma yongs su gzung zhing snod du
T02D2526:172b-33: rung bar bya'o // de nas slob dpon gyis rigs kyi bu smros shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2526:172b-35: byang chub sems ni bla med pas //
T02D2526:172b-36: rdo rje slob dpon bdag la stsol //
T02D2526:172b-37: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2526:172b-38: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2526:173a-0: @173a * // dge ba'i chos ni sdud ba dang //
T02D2526:173a-1: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2526:173a-2: sangs rgyas kun ni brtul zhugs che //
T02D2526:173a-3: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D2526:173a-4: dkon mchog gsum yang bdag la stsol //
T02D2526:173a-5: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang //
T02D2526:173a-6: slob dpon dag kyang bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2526:173a-7: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2526:173a-8: slob dpon du yang bdag 'gyur gyi //
T02D2526:173a-9: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2526:173a-10: sdom pa dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2526:173a-11: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa yang //
T02D2526:173a-12: sdom pa bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02D2526:173a-13: de bzhin las kyi rigs chen la //
T02D2526:173a-14: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2526:173a-15: mgon pos bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02D2526:173a-17: de ltar yongs su bzung nas lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D2526:173a-18: snying ga dang spyi bor de bzhin du bsams la /
T02D2526:173a-19: khu tshur g-yas pas rdo rje bzung nas snying gar
T02D2526:173a-20: bzhag na lhag par gnas bar byas par 'gyur ro
T02D2526:173a-21: // de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2526:173a-22: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2526:173a-23: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02D2526:173a-24: byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02D2526:173a-25: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams//
T02D2526:173a-26: byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'i //
T02D2526:173a-27: byang chub sems ni bla med pas //
T02D2526:173a-28: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2526:173a-29: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2526:173a-30: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2526:173a-31: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2526:173a-32: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2526:173a-33: de bzhin brtan par gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2526:173a-34: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2526:173a-35: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2526:173a-36: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2526:173a-37: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02D2526:173a-38: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2526:173a-39: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2526:173a-40: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi ;
T02D2526:173a-41: / slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2526:173a-42: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2526:173a-43: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2526:173a-44: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D2526:173a-45: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D2526:173a-46: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02D2526:173a-47: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02D2526:173b-0: phyi nang gsang ba @173b theg pa gsum //
T02D2526:173b-1: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2526:173b-2: las kyi rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02D2526:173b-3: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2526:173b-4: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2526:173b-5: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2526:173b-6: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2526:173b-7: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi ;
T02D2526:173b-8: / sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2526:173b-9: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2526:173b-10: ma bskal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2526:173b-11: ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol //
T02D2526:173b-12: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2526:173b-13: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2526:173b-14: de ltar sdom pa 'dzin nus pa de la ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bgyi'o //
T02D2526:173b-15: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la gal te bgegs byung bar gyur na /
T02D2526:173b-16: de'i tshe rdo rje gnod spyin gyi sngags 'bum bzlas
T02D2526:173b-17: pa'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la gdab par bya
T02D2526:173b-18: ste / dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su phur bus gdab bo //
T02D2526:173b-19: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab tu lcags ri'i thig gdab /
T02D2526:173b-20: de'i rgyab tu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab kyi
T02D2526:173b-21: phyi rol tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs
T02D2526:173b-22: pa'i bgegs rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug
T02D2526:173b-23: la bcings te phur bus gdab /
T02D2526:173b-24: shar lho'i mtshams su ni me'i bgegs so ;
T02D2526:173b-25: / lhor ni yi dags kyi bgegs so //
T02D2526:173b-26: lho nub tu ni srin po la sogs pa'i bgegs so //
T02D2526:173b-27: nub tu ni klu la sogs pa'i bgegs so //
T02D2526:173b-28: nub byang tu ni rlung gi bgegs so //
T02D2526:173b-29: byang du ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bgegs so //
T02D2526:173b-30: byang shar du ni 'byung po'i bgegs so //
T02D2526:173b-31: gsang sngags 'di phur bus gdab bo //
T02D2526:173b-32: aom badzra k'i li sarba bi ghn'am bandha h'um phat /
T02D2526:173b-33: rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu phur bus bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2526:173b-34: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis steng du nam mkha' bcing ngo //
T02D2526:173b-35: rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje
T02D2526:173b-36: bsdams pa'i steng du rdo rje dra ba byas te
T02D2526:173b-38: sems can 'tshe bar byed pa dang //
T02D2526:173b-39: sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs //
T02D2526:173b-40: rig sngags las byung dge ba sbyin //
T02D2526:173b-41: bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung //
T02D2526:174a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba thams cad rdzogs pa nas lha rnams ji lta @174a * //
T02D2526:174a-1: ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol /
T02D2526:174a-2: phur bu bton nas 'o mas bkrus te /
T02D2526:174a-3: sems can thams cad la dmigs nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2526:174a-4: shar phyogs kyi sgor kha khyer gyi phyi rol rdo
T02D2526:174a-5: rje lta bu'i kha khyer la byang du mngon par
T02D2526:174a-6: bltas nas / til bsregs nas sdig pa bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2526:174a-7: de bzhin du lho sgor rin po che 'dra ba'i
T02D2526:174a-8: kha khyer la shar du mngon par bltas nas rgyas
T02D2526:174a-9: par 'dod pas 'bras kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2526:174a-10: de bzhin du nub sgor zla ba kham pa lta
T02D2526:174a-11: bu'i kha khyer la byang du mngon par bltas nas
T02D2526:174a-12: tshe 'phel bar 'dod pas d'ur ba'i myu gu mar
T02D2526:174a-13: la spags pa'i spyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2526:174a-14: de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi sgor go cha 'dra
T02D2526:174a-15: ba'i kha khyer la lho phyogs su mngon par bltas
T02D2526:174a-17: ku sha'i myu gu til mar gyis byugs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2526:174a-18: yang na de bzhin du shar sgor kha khyer kun
T02D2526:174a-19: nas zlum po'i rnam pa la til la sogs pa'i
T02D2526:174a-20: sbyin sreg bya'o // thab khung gi phyi rol tu shar nas byang du blta ba dang /
T02D2526:174a-21: byang nas shar du blta ba dang /
T02D2526:174a-22: lho nas shar du blta ba dang /
T02D2526:174a-23: nub nas lhor blta ba dang /
T02D2526:174a-24: ku sha bkram la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2526:174a-25: de yang dkyil 'khor de dag de nyid ni //
T02D2526:174a-26: su zhig gis ni brtag par nus //
T02D2526:174a-27: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2526:174a-29: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2526:174a-30: slob dpon gyis rab tu bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las rnams bslab par bya ste /
T02D2526:174a-31: de nyid ni rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i gnas gsang ba ste /
T02D2526:174a-32: gsang ba ni 'di nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2526:174a-33: de nas rdo rje slob ma'i tshogs rab tu bcug la /
T02D2526:174a-34: rdo rje'i chu la 'bum bzlas pas dbang bskur la /
T02D2526:174a-35: rdo rje slob dpon nyid thob par 'gyur te /
T02D2526:174a-36: 'di yang rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba'i sngags so //
T02D2526:174a-37: aom badzrod ka h'um 'dis dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor
T02D2526:174a-38: thams cad bri zhing bdag nyid dbang bskur bas dbang
T02D2526:174a-39: bskur ro // gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
T02D2526:174b-0: de bzhin @174b gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i slob dpon gzhan ni /
T02D2526:174b-1: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2526:174b-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje slob dpon gyi las dang /
T02D2526:174b-3: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
T02D2526:174b-4: par ni de nyid las 'byung bas 'dir ma smras
T02D2526:174b-5: so // de lta mod kyi khyad par cung zad cig bshad par bya ste /
T02D2526:174b-6: rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma las yon blang bar bya ste /
T02D2526:174b-7: slob mas kyang gus pas mchod yon sngon du 'gro bas yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2526:174b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par mos pas yon gyi mchog rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2526:174b-9: gang la yongs su btang dga' gang //
T02D2526:174b-10: de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin //
T02D2526:174b-11: de la gal te mchog 'dod la //
T02D2526:174b-12: de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na //
T02D2526:174b-13: kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na //
T02D2526:174b-14: de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob //
T02D2526:174b-15: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du lhag par mos pas ni /
T02D2526:174b-16: bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am /
T02D2526:174b-17: de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag / phul nas rin gyis slu ba ni //
T02D2526:174b-18: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon //
T02D2526:174b-19: phyag na rdo rje'i ni rin chen rgyan thams cad
T02D2526:174b-20: kyi mchog dang ldan pa phul nas slar rin gyis
T02D2526:174b-21: slu bar bya'o // 'jig rten dbang phyug gis ni
T02D2526:174b-22: shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung ngam mu tig gi
T02D2526:174b-24: nam mkha'i snying po'i rta dang glang po dkar po'am
T02D2526:174b-25: shing rta nor bu rin po che la sogs pas
T02D2526:174b-26: brgyan pa'o // rdo rje sna tshogs kyi ni yon
T02D2526:174b-27: thams cad blangs la cho ga 'dis dbang bskur bar
T02D2526:174b-28: brgyan pa'o // bya'o // de la rgyal po ni rin po che las byas pa'i dbu rgyan no //
T02D2526:174b-29: lhag ma rnams ni lugs ma'am bcos ma byas pa'o //
T02D2526:174b-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rin po che dang /
T02D2526:174b-31: dar dpyangs dang dbang bskur ba'i dbu rgyan no//
T02D2526:174b-32: phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan no //
T02D2526:174b-33: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan no //
T02D2526:174b-34: nam mkha'i snying po'i ni rdo rje rin chen gyi myu gu dang ldan pa'i dbu rgyan no //
T02D2526:175a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rin po @175a * //
T02D2526:175a-1: ches khams gsum gyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan te /
T02D2526:175a-2: dbu rgyan gyi gsang sngags sngar bzlas brjod 'bum byas
T02D2526:175a-3: la dbang bskur ba'i dus su dbu rgyan rang gi
T02D2526:175a-4: gsang sngags kyis lan brgya bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2526:175a-5: de nas dar dpyangs mgo la bcings nas rang gi rdo rje lag par bzhag la /
T02D2526:175a-6: ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2526:175a-7: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02D2526:175a-8: de nas khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye
T02D2526:175a-9: shes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do
T02D2526:175a-10: // de nas de gang mngon par 'dod pa de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2526:175a-11: yang na phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod na
T02D2526:175a-12: de la rdo rje lta bu'i thabs kyi sgrub pa'i
T02D2526:175a-13: tshul gyis rang la sgrub pa'i thabs nye bar bstan
T02D2526:175a-14: par bya'o // de nas rang gi gnas su phyag
T02D2526:175a-15: rgya bkrol la dbang bskur ba dang cho ga bcings
T02D2526:175a-16: par bya'o // pa dang / mnyes par bya ba
T02D2526:175a-17: la sogs pa byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2526:175a-18: bcings la gyen du bkrol la /
T02D2526:175a-19: sems can log par lta ba dang /
T02D2526:175a-20: sdig pa'i las byed pa dang /
T02D2526:175a-23: ri mo mi shes pa de dag gi phyir kun
T02D2526:175a-24: du bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i tshul gyi
T02D2526:175a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu pa'i phyed
T02D2526:175a-26: kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
T02D2526:175a-27: yo byad thams cad dang mi ldan pa rnams dang /
T02D2526:175a-28: dam tshig 'dod pa rnams la ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2526:175a-29: de bzhin du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la
T02D2526:175a-30: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la dkyil 'khor thams
T02D2526:175a-31: cad kyi cho ga'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang /
T02D2526:175a-32: rang gi rtog pa'i cho gas bri bar bya'o //
T02D2526:175a-33: dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las //
T02D2526:175a-34: bsod nams bdag gis bsags pa de //
T02D2526:175a-35: des ni sems can ma lus pa //
T02D2526:175a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog 'grub shog / dpal ldan
